developer-idle: The Developer is RESTful enough to rest!
generate-failed-desc: While generating %file%, an error was thrown.
read-failed-desc: While reading %file%, an error was thrown.
write-failed-desc: While writing %file%, an error was thrown.
error-is-file: Couldn't open atom-discord folder in config directory.
error-is-file-desc: atom-discord is not a folder, it is a file!
error-is-directory-desc: %file% is not a file, but a directory!
error-no-discord-desc: Unless discord is turned on and atom is restarted, rich presence will not be shown.
error-no-discord-detail: You can suppress this notification in settings.
error-while-require: Error while executing discord sending code! :(
error-while-require-desc: Rich presence will not be shown. Please upload issue with this stacktrace.
config-imageCustom-desc: Set this to the custom key if you selected 'Custom' on Image
config-textCustom-desc: Set this to the custom text if you selected 'Custom' on Text. %projectName%, %fileName%, %type% is supported.
config-behaviour-customAppId-desc: Use custom app to change icon, app names. WARNING: changing this may result in Rich Presence malfunction
config-smallImage-desc: Change content of small image on Rich Presence
Change content of large image on Rich Presence
config-state-desc: Change content of primary text on Rich Presence
config-detail-desc: Change content of secondary text on Rich Presence
config-elapsed-desc: Change content of elapsed time on Rich Presence
config-elapsed-send-desc: Tick this if you want to show elapsed time.
config-elapsed-handleRest-disabled-desc: Elapsed time increases even if you're resting
config-elapsed-handleRest-reset-desc: Reset elapsed time when you're resting
config-elapsed-handleRest-resetAfterDela: Reset elapsed time when you're resting for a while.
config-elapsed-handleRest-pause-desc: Pause elapsed time increasing while you're resting
config-elapsed-handleRestDelay-desc: If you selected 'Reset After Delay', resting more than this time(seconds) will reset the elapsed time.
config-rest-restOnBlur-desc: Change status to rest if atom is not focused.
config-rest-restOnAfk-desc: Change status to rest if there's no mouse or keyboard action for a while. (Needs restart atom)
config-rest-restOnAfkThreshold-desc: If you turned on 'Rest On AFK', no interactions more than this time(seconds) will set your status as 'rest'.
config-rest-smallImageCustom-desc: Set this to the custom key if you selected 'Custom' on Small Image
config-rest-largeImageCustom-desc: Set this to the custom key if you selected 'Custom' on Large Image
config-rest-typeName-desc: This will be shown instead of the type.
config-rest-typeNameCustom-desc: Set this to the custom text if you selected 'Custom' on Type Name. %projectName% is supported.
config-rest-fileName-desc: This will be shown instead of the filename.
config-rest-fileNameCustom-desc: Set this to the custom text if you selected 'Custom' on File Name. %projectName% is supported.
config-troubleshooting-desc: Options to handle discord integration troubles
config-troubleshooting-ubuntuPatch-desc: Patch Discord Rich Presence not showing on Ubuntu 18.04. Tick this when you installed discord from Ubuntu Software
config-troubleshooting-debugLog-desc: Log debugging messages in atom-discord directory
config-troubleshooting-noDiscordNotifica: Show warning notification when discord is turned off or connection wasn't established
